Summary: Bubble/Balloon like object that vanished into thin air
divs: sighting detailswas observing the strange chemical clouds\haarp. then when looked to the east with blue sky showing saw a fast moving object reflecting light moving from the the north to the south. as soon as a white cloud was above the object it simply vanished. even after there were more blue skies in the path of the object. no sound, but was moving faster than a normal plane ans was going against the wind as well since there was no north to south wind but west to east. no idea on the height of the object. the object seemed to be like a ball shape with a transparentness to it. there was a reflecting like off the top right hand side of the object that would match with the position of the sun.
